## PolymorphicReferenceField variable

React Admin Field that renders a Rails-style polymorphic relationship


**Signature:**

```typescript
PolymorphicReferenceField: ({ source, }: PolymorphicReferenceFieldProps) => JSX.Element
```

## Example

return ( <PolymorphicReferenceField source='author' /> )
